name: Fallen Morals
description:
This is a simple platformer level for the game jam: Make A Level. It was a simple experiment to see if I could make a game within a week. I can fairly say it was successful. I don't know if I will pursue this again in the future, but if enough people request it, I may do so.

This story tells of an ordinary human, Joseph Nikolas, exploring the barren wasteland until he encounters something within the distance.
